items.name: init(mTimeStamp: AudioTimeStamp, mCompletionProc: ScheduledAudioFileRegionCompletionProc?, mCompletionProcUserData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, mAudioFile: OpaquePointer, mLoopCount: UInt32, mStartFrame: Int64, mFramesToPlay: UInt32)
var mAudioFile: OpaquePointer
items.desc: Must be a valid and already-open audio file object (of type AudioFileID), as declared in AudioToolbox/AudioFile.h.

items.name: var mFramesToPlay: UInt32
items.desc: The number of frames to play.

items.name: var mStartFrame: Int64
items.desc: The frame offset into the file.
